actions.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 218 (Roll no. 257).

description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the National Park Service by $15.5 million and reduce Forest Service reconstruction and construction funding by the same amount.
purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the National Park Service for operation and maintenance by $15,579,000 and to reduce funding by a comparable amount the funds appropriated for the Department of Agriculture for road reconstruction and construction by the Forest Service.
